channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 14:51 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District Survene from further reports.
item.description: 游댮 14:51 Air alarm to Sinelnikovsky District Survene from further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
